name: Power Marauder
description:
Uh oh! Looks like the city you live in is in it's quarterly electricity save once more (instead of using their budget to fix the structural issues). Good thing it is time for your heist!

Controls: Arrows to move, spacebar to jump (WASD alternatively).

Credits:

Alexander Go: Programming, Level Design.

Jake Shonts: Programming, Shaders.

Gale Falikson: Art assets, Animation, Music.

David wong: Concept.
